Name: Life of Food
About the game: Fight through a campaign with multiple levels as four different characters, or play against or with your friends in the arena. Punch and slam enemies as a carrot while fighting through a corn field. Shoot and use special attacks when playing as corn while making your way through the store. At the house find your way through the level while playing as the tank like pickle. Find your way through the end of the sewers to unlock the secret character. Each character has a unique set of skills and animations. Fight against hordes of enemies with your friends or by yourself, or fight your friends in the arena mode. Four unique levels are playable in the arena mode. Fight on the top of an airplane, on a beach, on top of a skyscraper, or in a coliseum.
